title: First Solar Inc may invest Rs 2,500 cr for tech upgrade in Tamil Nadu mfg units
description: First Solar is the country's first fully integrated vertically integrated solar manufacturing plant - from semiconductors to modules - with a capacity of 3.3 GW. The company expects the upgradation to result in increasing the effective incremental capacity of the manufacturing to 3.5 GW and create additional 300 jobs.
